title: New Blood Moon skins.

embed.description: Surrender at 20 brings you League of Legends content ranging from news and developer talk recaps to the latest updates and unexpected leaks!

body: The assumption would be this is a new skin in the popular Blood Moon skin line and the gun that resembles that of Jhin.

replies.body: Still holding onto hope for {{champion:131}}, but yea one has gotta be jhin.

so the caption says "blood in the heavens, blood on the earth".  like normal, they have 2 bloodmoon skins at a time. so if jhin is blood on earth, then that leaves a godlike figure for blood in the heavens.  my guess is either A-sol or illaoi.

> [{quoted}](name=reaperteaser,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=6NIfEoiv,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-20T21:50:13.907+0000)
>
> so the caption says "blood in the heavens, blood on the earth".  like normal, they have 2 bloodmoon skins at a time. so if jhin is blood on earth, then that leaves a godlike figure for blood in the heavens.  my guess is either A-sol or illaoi.

Blood in the heavens directly relates to the Blood Moon itself. I don't think this correlates to a celestial champion.

A-sol, New way of saying A**hole without getting chat restricted.
Personally it could be {{champion:136}} or {{champion:161}} IMO.
Had it been ''Blood in hell, Blood on earth'' It would have confirmed Blood Moon {{champion:17}}.
Someone pointed out how the arch & moon create an eye, and going with this thread that the "heavens" champ is a bit godly, I would suspect Velkoz.
I get why Aurelion, but what does Illaoi have to do with the sky? If it was water related it could have been (or... God save us... Bloodmoon Fizz).
Jhin, Yi, Karma, Irelia are the likely candidates. Obviously Jhin, because his gun is right there.
guys guys guys the skins are gunna be for twisted fate.   jhin.   diana.   and talon.  ðŸ‘Œ

Ok, ok, ok. I know Azir just get a Warring Kingdoms skin, BUT I think that "pilar" above a Jhin gun is Azir passive.
But personaly, as a Diana main, I really hope that is not ture.
